projects.description: in its essence it's similar to the hangman game except that it has a little bit different gameplay. the app is divided into 2 apps the server app (which uses nodejs) and client app which is this flutter app. the client and the server uses socket.io to open a bi-directional channel for real time communication. the game rules are quite simple you just join and wait for another player to join ...
